testcase.classname: To verify aircraft vitals on dashboard
testcase.name: User request for latest aircraft vital
testcase.system-out: Given User is already logged in.............................................passed Given User is on My Hangar screen...........................................passed When User navigate to dashboard for aircaft FHA762OIU.......................passed And User verify dashboard is displayed with all required aircraft vitals for aircraft FHA762OIU.passed When User refresh dashboard for updated aircraft vitals.....................passed Then Dahsboard should be updated with latest aircraft vitals................passed
